testcase.classname: vegetable search and place order on greenKart
testcase.name: Validation of search functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User logged into greenKart home page..................................passed When User search "Cucumber" on search option................................passed Then "Cucumber" vegetable should be shortlisted.............................passed

testcase.classname: vegetable search and place order on greenKart
testcase.name: Validation of search functionality and placing the order
testcase.system-out: Given User logged into greenKart home page..................................passed When User search "Brinjal" on search option.................................passed And Added "5" items to the cart by clicking add to cart button..............passed And User clicks on ProccedToCheckOut button.................................passed Then User should navigate to order confirmation page........................passed And product name should contains "Brinjal" and Quantity as "5"..............passed And Place order button should be enabled....................................passed
